comment: Nah, it's just that when you have million shitheads in southern California and they buy your album, hell, fuck the rest of the world, that's all the money you need right there. It's like when I see what's trending on Youtube. million view to watch some asshole eat a burger in Los Angeles. At least of those views are from the area, I'd bet.
